}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "10049678" and"V1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. <!-- *[http://lovetans.blog.163.com/blog/static/73633086201731054822/ ''Tenda U12 AC1300 USB 3.0 Adapter'' on '''Lovetans'''] (PCB V1.2 images) *[https://github.com/xxNull-lsk/rtl8812AU/commit/a88cb341d021b58397307a144b1af1d9941da5c0 ''Tenda U12'' - Linux driver] :• [[Tenda U12]] (V1.0) - [[Realtek]] RTL8812AU ([http://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/2604/0012 2604:0012]) --> ==See also== :;[[Tenda]] • [[Tenda PCB ID]] *[[Tenda U1]] • *[[Tenda U2]] (v4/v5) • *[[Tenda U3 v1]] (v2) • *[[Tenda U6]] • *[[Tenda U9]] • [https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07FLXVPTL B07FLXVPTL] *[[Tenda U10]] • *[[Tenda U12]] • [https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B06X1CTFMT B06X1CTFMT] • [https://device.report/tenda/u12 Spec.] *[[Tenda U18]] (v2) • [https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B09MJ1TCHB B09MJ1TCHB] • [https://device.report/tenda/U18 Spec.] *[[Tenda U18a]] (v2) • [https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B09ZNSQV54 B09ZNSQV54]
